trans-unit.source: Provides a XAML-friendly implementation of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that filters on a single action.
trans-unit.target: XAML-barát valósítja meg a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"> </xref> szűrőit, amely egyetlen művelettel.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja azt a műveletet a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The action for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A művelet a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy az aktuális <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> megegyezik a megadott <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> való összehasonlításra az aktuális <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a megadott <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> megegyezik a jelenlegi <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A kivonatkódját adja vissza a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A kivonatoló kódját a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified message’s action matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy a megadott üzenet művelet megegyezik-e a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>ezen <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Egy üzenet művelet van megadva a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>tulajdonság az üzenet <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message to compare.
trans-unit.target: Az üzenet összehasonlítani.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a művelet megegyezik; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the action of the message contained by the specified message buffer matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy a művelet található a megadott üzenet puffer az üzenet megfelel-e a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>ezen <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Egy üzenet művelet van megadva a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>tulajdonság az üzenet <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message buffer that contains the message to compare.
trans-unit.target: Az üzenetpuffer, amely tartalmazza az üzenet összehasonlítani.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a művelet megegyezik; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> representation of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Értéket ad vissza egy <xref:System.String>ábrázolását a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> property is set, its value is used to build the string representation; otherwise, the base class <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A>tulajdonság értéke, értéke pedig a karakterlánc-ábrázolása létrehozásához használt; ellenkező esetben az alaposztály <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>értéket adja vissza.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.
